com.soa.soap.message
Interface SOAPMessageFactory

public interface SOAPMessageFactory

Interface for constructing SOAPMessage objects. Empty messages can be constructed as well as messages created from existing content.

Since:
3.1

Method Summary
 SOAPMessage convertVersion(SOAPMessage message, SOAPVersion version)
          Creates a SOAPMessage with the same content as the input message but in a differetn SOAP version.

          Creates a SOAP fault from the given content.

Method Detail

createMessage

SOAPMessage createMessage(SOAPVersion version)
                          throws GException
Creates a SOAPMessage holding an empty SOAP envelope.

Parameters:
version - SOAPVersion of the message to create.
Returns:
SOAPMessage holding an empty SOAP envelope.
Throws:
GException - Thrown if unable to create the message.

createMessage

SOAPMessage createMessage()
                          throws GException
Creates a SOAPMessage holding an empty SOAP envelope. Since no version is specified in this signature, the default version (1.1) is used.

Returns:
SOAPMessage holding an empty SOAP envelope.
Throws:
GException - Thrown if unable to create the message.

createMessage

SOAPMessage createMessage(javax.xml.transform.Source envelope,
                          SOAPVersion version)
                          throws GException
Creates a SOAPMessage from the given content. The version of the message in the given content is supplied for optimization reasons. If the version is not known at construction time, use the createMessage method without the version parameter.

Parameters:
envelope - Source holding a valid SOAP envelope.
version - SOAPVersion of the envelope.
Returns:
SOAPMessage holding the provided envelope.
Throws:
GException - Thrown if unable to create the message. Most likely caused to an invalid SOAP envelope given as input.

createMessage

SOAPMessage createMessage(javax.xml.transform.Source envelope)
                          throws GException
Creates a SOAPMessage from the given content. The version of the message will be determined by parsing the supplied Source.

Parameters:
envelope - Source holding a valid SOAP envelope.
Returns:
SOAPMessage holding the provided envelope.
Throws:
GException - Thrown if unable to create the message. Most likely caused to an invalid SOAP envelope given as input.

createMessageWithBody

SOAPMessage createMessageWithBody(javax.xml.transform.Source body,
                                  SOAPVersion version)
                                  throws GException
Creates a SOAPMessage with the given content as its body.

Parameters:
body - Source holding the body content.
version - SOAPVersion of the message to create.
Returns:
SOAPMessage with the given body.
Throws:
GException - Thrown if unable to create message.

createMessageWithBody

SOAPMessage createMessageWithBody(javax.xml.transform.Source body)
                                  throws GException
Creates a SOAPMessage with the given content as its body. Since no version is specified in this signature, the default version (1.1) is used.

Parameters:
body - Source holding the body content.
Returns:
SOAPMessage with the given body.
Throws:
GException - Thrown if unable to create message.

createFault

SOAPMessage createFault(FaultInformation faultInfo,
                        javax.xml.transform.Source detail,
                        SOAPVersion version)
                        throws GException
Creates a SOAP fault from the given content.

Parameters:
faultInfo - FaultInformation holding core fault parameters. Required.
detail - Source holding application fault information. Optional.
version - SOAPVersion identifying the SOAP version of the fault.
Returns:
SOAPMessage with the fault.
Throws:
GException - Thrown if unable to create the fault. Most likely caused by the absence of a fault code or an invalid detail.

createFault

SOAPMessage createFault(FaultInformation faultInfo,
                        javax.xml.transform.Source detail)
                        throws GException
Creates a SOAP fault from the given content. Since no version is specified in this signature, the default version (1.1) is used.

Parameters:
faultInfo - FaultInformation holding core fault parameters. Required.
detail - Source holding application fault information. Optional.
Returns:
SOAPMessage with the fault.
Throws:
GException - Thrown if unable to create the fault. Most likely caused by the absense of a fault code or an invalid detail.

convertVersion

SOAPMessage convertVersion(SOAPMessage message,
                           SOAPVersion version)
                           throws GException
Creates a SOAPMessage with the same content as the input message but in a differetn SOAP version.

Parameters:
message - SOAPMessage to convert from. Required.
version - SOAPVersion identifying the SOAP version to convert to.
Returns:
SOAPMessage with different SOAP version..
Throws:
GException - Thrown if unable to create the message.
